titles: Some considerations about the case of scandal, or, Giving offence to weak brethren
author: Calamy, Benjamin, 1642-1686.
publisher: Printed by H. Hills Jun. for T. Basset ..., B. Tooke ..., and F. Gardiner ...,
notes: Written by Benjamin Calamy.  Cf. DNB.
A copy at reel 528:1 is eleventh item in v. 1 of A collection of cases and other discourses / by some divines of the city of London.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Dissenters, Religious --  England --  Early works to 1800.
